title: Golden Kebabs with Zesty Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '2 tsp turmeric', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '4 skinless chicken breast fillets, about 125g each', '3 nectarines, halved and stoned', '12 baby peppers, halved', '2 spring onions, chopped', 'grated zest of 1/2 lemon', '100ml mayonnaise', '75ml plain low-fat yoghurt', 'pinch of cayenne pepper or chilli powder (optional)', 'lemon juice, to taste']
